title: Electrostatics - Delta V_Q_and E of capacitor

content.description: A parallel-plate capacitor is connected to a power source and charges completely. The power source is disconnected, and the separation between the two plates is decreased. Which of the following correctly describes the changes, if any, to the potential difference between the plates, the charge on the plates and the electric field between the plates because of the change in separation?
